amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce spending in Energy and Water Development division by 5percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to reduce spending in Division E by 5 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A114) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 288 (Roll no. 358).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
